H2.text: what to visit in london city. The London Eye

H3.text: what to visit in london city. Hyde Park

A4.text: Buckingham Palace is often at the centre of state occasions and royal hospitality.

A5.text: The state rooms, used for official and state entertaining, are open to the public each year for most of August and September and on some days in winter and spring.
